welcome_message_body: Welcome to the enchanting city of Guilin! Known for its stunning karst landscape, picturesque rivers, and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty and charm of this remarkable destination. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Don Quijote (Leyenda)
restaurants.description: Don Quijote (Leyenda) is a spanish restaurant located in 桂林市.
restaurants.address: Renmin Road, 桂林市, 广西, 541000
